name: Mr. Goose
description:
This is a mini-game about an extraordinary goose with magical powers and one of the world's leading animal welfare organisations ((The) Animal Nationhood And Lasting-Welfare Humanitarian Organisation) at his proposal. Now, after successfully entered the centre of Nouvion, Mr. Goose finds himself surrounded by the undisputed greatest army of the world, i.e. the French army. Defend yourself against the waves of high-skilled enemies destined to destroy you and put your fat liver on their kitchen table. 

This is basically a prototype of  what might be one day a complete game, so it is not filled with a lot of content and the assets are mainly constructed in Unity. Reasonable feedback and input will be noted and might be implemented in future updates.

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Move faster: Left Shift (switch)
Zoom camera: Mouse Scroll
Flying: hold Spacebar
Faster Descent: Hold Z
Make wings weapon-ready/Hide weapons: R (switch)
Open weapon-menu: V (and wings must be weapon-ready)
Spin camera around Mr Goose: Q (Hold)
Fire small weapons(SHG/MAG(hold)): Left Mouse Button
Fire heavy weapons(RPG/GRL): Right Mouse Button
Activate shield: G
(De)Activate cigar: C (switch)
Take a shit: H (Dropping Magic Goose Shit that acts as enemy-triggered mines)

Pause the Game: P
End Application: Escape (This ends the game without warning)

Mega Head Smash Attack: T (Available after a score of 1000 or more, decreases your health with 50 and a minimum health of 100 is needed)

Speed up Day-Night-cycle: Up Arrow Key (Switch)

Sound effects and voices are from yours truly, www.freesfx.co.uk/ and www.soundbible.com/.

CAUTION: The game is quite violent with the possibility of severed limbs but the amount of blood is minuscule. No geese were harmed during the production of this game.
